creator: seth@eserv.com.au
text:
When using the cvs task, if I specify a "dest" the task does not execute.

For Example...
Task without dest:
	<target name="cvsco">
		<!-- Get a fresh copy of the sources from cvs -->
		<echo message="start cvs"/>
		<cvs package="java"/>
		<echo message="cvs done."/>
	</target>
Output when run with -verbose option:

		<echo message="cvs done."/>
	</target>

help please.
Thanks
Seth.

Could this be another manifestation of the "cariage return chars in antRun" bug
of the Ant 1.3 distribution?
